name: viralspark-ailice
description: AIlice - Fully Autonomous AI Agent with Enterprise-Grade Features. Enhanced with Stripe payments, 50+ API endpoints, media processing, real-time collaboration, and advanced AI capabilities.

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL database connection string (e.g., postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/dbname). Required for storing user data, subscriptions, and analytics.

JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for JWT token generation (min 32 characters). Use a secure random string.

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret API key (sk_live_... or sk_test_...). Get from https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys

STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Stripe webhook signing secret (whsec_...). Create at https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks after deployment.

STRIPE_PRICE_ID.description: Stripe Price ID for subscription ($49.99/mo by default). Get from Stripe Dashboard.

STRIPE_PRODUCT_ID.description: Stripe Product ID for your subscription. Get from Stripe Dashboard.

REPLICATE_API_TOKEN.description: Replicate API token for AI model inference. Get from https://replicate.com/account/api-tokens

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini API key for AI capabilities. Get from https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Google API key for various Google services. Get from Google Cloud Console.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for GPT models. Get from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

TWITTER_API_KEY.description: Twitter API key for social media integration.

TWITTER_API_SECRET.description: Twitter API secret for social media integration.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Twitter access token for social media posting.

TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET.description: Twitter access token secret for social media posting.

CORS_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (e.g., https://app.example.com,https://admin.example.com). Use * for all origins (not recommended for production).

AILICE_MODEL_ID.description: Override default AI model ID (optional). See config.json for available models.

AILICE_TEMPERATURE.description: AI model temperature (0.0-1.0). Lower = more deterministic, Higher = more creative.

hooks.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment complete! Configure Stripe webhooks at: https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks'
